name: Pumpkin Transformation Stick
description: Dimensional item\\nTransformation stick that turns you into a pumpkin. Can be used for 30 days. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

name: Shadow Item - Gatekeeper Transformation Stick
description: Allows you to transform into a Gatekeeper for 60 minutes. The transformation ends when you cancel the equip. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Red Talisman - Max CP
description: Increases Max CP when equipped. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. Shadow Item that cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Red Talisman - CP Regeneration
description: Increases CP regeneration rate when equipped. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. Shadow Item that cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Yellow Talisman - Increase Force
description: Increases your Force Level when attacked while equipped. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. Shadow Item that cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Yellow Talisman - Damage Transition
description: Transfers a portion of damage you take onto your servitor while equipped. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. Shadow Item that cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Recovery Spellbook for Combat Use
description: Spellbook that restores a character's lowered Exp. at death. Usable only in combat

name: Blueprint - Summon Merchant Golem
description: Blueprint needed to learn the Summon Merchant Golem skill. Used by Warsmiths.\\nRequired level: 52\0

name: Accessory Life Stone -  Level 80
description: A mineral that has been petrified by a creature's physical or magical damage. Usable by characters level 80 and above when augmenting items

name: Accessory Life Stone -  Level 82
description: A mineral that has been petrified by a creature's physical or magical damage. Usable by characters level 82 and above when augmenting items

name: Casian's Blue Crystal
description: A gift that Casian received as a child from the Water Dragon. Take it to Galate
